1.name: Shadow Rend
1.description: A devastating strike of pure shadow. Ignores half armor.

2.name: Void Pulse
2.description: Emits a pulse of void energy that damages nearby enemies.

3.name: Divine Strike
3.description: A radiant melee attack that burns evil flesh.

4.name: Protective Flare
4.description: Blinds adjacent enemies and grants temporary AC to allies.

5.name: Arcane Bolt
5.description: Fires a concentrated bolt of pure arcane force.

6.name: Time Ripple
6.description: Slows the movement of enemies within a small radius.

7.name: Rusty Swing
7.description: A wild and basic strike with a crude blade.

8.name: Battle Shout
8.description: A guttural roar that intimidates and lowers AC.

9.name: Piercing Shot
9.description: Fires a precise arrow that pierces enemy armor.

10.name: Marked Prey
10.description: Marks a single enemy, increasing damage taken from allies.

11.name: Radiant Heal
11.description: Heals a nearby ally with divine light.

12.name: Holy Surge
12.description: Smashes an enemy with a radiant blow that restores HP to the caster.

13.name: Smoke Strike
13.description: Vanish and strike from behind. High crit chance if flanking.

14.name: Shadowstep
14.description: Teleports behind the target within range, ignoring terrain.

15.name: Skullcrusher
15.description: A brutal overhead swing meant to stagger or crush the enemy.

16.name: Raging Blow
16.description: A wild strike that increases damage but lowers the user's AC.
